descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Future Earth is a dystopian battleground. Robots are at war with each other. Play as a Sentient Intelligent robot in this fast-paced, multiplayer shooter.

Built from the ground up, specifically for Mobile VR, HAX offers highly intuitive controls, groundbreaking weapon mechanics, super-sampled graphics, and dedicated servers. Customize your weapons, attachments, characters, camos and more. Earn your rank insignia and wear it for all to see as you climb your way to the top of the leaderboards.

Humans have mysteriously disappeared leaving two warring, robot factions; The UNR (United Nations Robotics), a peace keeping division who will stop at nothing, they will even use force to spread peace; and the 404, a corrupt military group spreading their infectious code.

What is HAX? It’s a radioactive, programmable gas used to power weapons and hack other robots by firing data packets. One simple HAX Mag can be loaded into a firearm, turned into a sword, thrown as a grenade, or used to hack objectives and other players. This all-in-one Mag makes HAX incredibly easy to learn and fun to play.
